If a contestant is really stinking it up performance-wise, audience members with a high need for power will want to see the person judged poorly, perhaps even humiliated. "he jumped" and "won't stay that long" at the company. He Was Pushed Eric Schmidt stepping down creates a "huge advantage" for Google, writes Danny Sullivan at Search Engine Land. If Page is stepping up as the public face, it's an opportunity to defuse or put some of the gaffes associated with Eric Schmidt behind the company. Page carries virtually no such baggage.
